68561cd4801134be939e11f6 description: Hey soldier! I have a request for you. Back when I worked in the Factory, I remember hearing one of my bosses talking about an Antique Pistol that was kept in a display case. I believe that it was gifted to an accountant that the boss dealt with. I'd really like you to find it and bring it to me! Try searching the Black Knight building over in Reserve.
68561cd4801134be939e11f6 startedMessageT: Alright, Like I said the office of the accountant should be located over in the Black Knight building. Try checking the upper floor; there is probably a sign or something on the outside of the office.
68561cd4801134be939e11f6 successMessageT: Thank you! This is going to make a great part of my collection!
68561b99da76e0be82eb3866: Find the Antique Pistol Case located in the Senior Accountant's office located in Black Knight.
